Title: S3:E7 - From tech blogger to Fog Creek CEO (Anil Dash)
Description: Anil Dash has been in tech for a long time. He’s a vocal advocate for inclusion and humane tech, writes amazing blog posts (and tweets!), and is now the CEO of Fog Creek. He shares how he navigated his impressive career in tech and how he builds kindness and community into his company's products. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
